abstract: Carl Icahn ratchets up his campaign against Yahoo’s directors with withering criticism of their failure to sell the company to Microsoft.
snippet: Carl Icahn ratchets up his campaign against Yahoo’s directors with withering criticism of their failure to sell the company to Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn sharpened his attack on Yahoo with a public letter to the company’s board that says “the only way to salvage Yahoo is to merge with Microsoft.”
